tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (CD 4) (NNS days)) (PP (IN until) (NP (DT an) (JJ entire) (NN month))) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN happiness))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [days/NNS nummod>4/CD nmod:until>[month/NN case>until/IN det>an/DT amod>entire/JJ] nmod:of>[happiness/NN case>of/IN] punct>!/.]
